title: DesignEmails
description: Design specification for case emails, including briefing (required) and optional update emails (Advanced/Expert only). Emails are generated by AI to replace static extraction from police_report.

emails.description: List of email design specifications. Rookie/Intermediate: 1 briefing. Advanced/Expert: 1 briefing + 1 update (may be gated).

contentDesign.description: DESIGN INSTRUCTIONS for email body generation (not the final content). Describe tone, key points, and structure. Expand phase will generate the actual 300-600 word body based on these instructions.

sentAt.description: ISO-8601 timestamp with timezone offset when email was sent. MUST use the SAME timezone offset as Expand timeline. Briefing should be early in investigation timeline, update later (if gated).

attachments.description: Array of document references in format '@documents/<docId>' (e.g., '@documents/doc_police_report_001'). Briefing typically links to police_report.

gated.description: Whether email is locked until requirements satisfied. Briefing should always be false. Update may be true for Advanced/Expert.

gatingRule.description: Gating rule defining unlock conditions. Required if gated=true, must be null if gated=false.

requiredNodeIds.description: Array of document IDs that must be read before email unlocks (e.g., ['doc_police_report_001', 'doc_forensics_001'])

tone.description: Expected tone for email body (e.g., 'professional, authoritative', 'urgent, focused')

wordCountTarget.description: Target word count range for email body

contextUsed.description: Record of which contexts were used for design generation
